      • adminLogin

        java.lang.String[] adminLogin(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        username - of the admin client
        password - of the admin client
        Returns:
        String[] information required by client, String deptName and String of boolean admin value
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if user with that information does not exist
